img_above_text:
After defeating the boss, climb the arm that touches the ground and you'll meet the monkey again. Let the cutscene play and you'll get the Skandha of Consciousness.
## How to Use the Five Skandhas
img_below_text:
With all five in your inventory, go to Xu Dog and deliver the Skandhas. You'll then have the option to tell Xu Dog to make the Five Skandhas Pill. Receiving this will boost your health, mana, and stamina.
The Five Skandhas

img_summary: The image shows a scene where the player character interacts with "Xu Dog," a key NPC in the game. The menu options on the left suggest the player can "Show the Five Skandhas," among other actions like requesting or making medicines. This interaction is part of a quest where the player delivers the Five Skandhas to Xu Dog, enabling the creation of the Five Skandhas Pill, which enhances the player's health, mana, and stamina.
